title: Energy Optimization for Manufacturing Plant
project_background: Our client, a leading manufacturing facility with operations across India, was facing rising energy costs, inefficiencies in equipment usage, and increasing pressure to adopt sustainable practices. They approached us to conduct a comprehensive energy audit and deliver a strategy that balances cost savings with sustainability goals.
impact_subtitle: Through strategic energy optimization and renewable integration, we delivered measurable results that exceeded expectations.
challenge_points: Our certified and experienced auditors systematically collect and analyze the significant energy flows and losses.
Inspection of lighting, air conditioning, heating and ventilation, refrigeration, compressors, and other heavy equipment.
Measurement of temperatures, pressures, illumination levels, power draw, and consumption patterns.
solution_points: Optimized major energy loss areas after detailed analysis.
Upgraded inefficient systems and improved operational workflows.
Introduced renewable integration for stable and clean power.
Real-time monitoring systems installed for continuous evaluation.

methodology_steps.description: Conducted a detailed assessment and analyzed consumption patterns.

methodology_steps.title: Data Collection
methodology_steps.description: Measured power, load variation, and operational inefficiencies.

methodology_steps.title: Analysis & Reporting
methodology_steps.description: Identified major gaps and prepared audit reports.

methodology_steps.title: Implementation
methodology_steps.description: Executed improvement strategies for maximum savings.

title: Solar Rooftop Deployment for Commercial Building
project_background: The client was experiencing high electricity costs and grid instability at their commercial complex. PPS Energy implemented a solar rooftop project designed for maximum efficiency and long-term savings.
impact_subtitle: Solar deployment helped the client reduce grid dependency and significantly lowered electricity bills.
solution_points: Developed lightweight structural mounts for rooftop panels.
Configured the plant for optimal sunlight exposure using AI-based tools.
Delivered the project with zero operational downtime.

results.title: Annual Savings
results.description: ₹32 lakhs saved yearly in electricity costs.

title: HT/LT Panel Upgrade for Industrial Plant
project_background: The client faced repeated power trips and downtime due to outdated HT/LT panels. PPS Energy modernized the complete system to enhance reliability and safety.
impact_subtitle: Upgrading HT/LT panels reduced downtime and improved safety compliance.
challenge_points: Old HT/LT panels with unsafe wiring.
High failure rate during peak industrial load.
Non-compliance with updated electrical safety norms.
solution_points: Installed new HT/LT panels with enhanced safety features.
Redesigned electrical layout for operational efficiency.
Conducted safety training for plant operators.

results.title: Enhanced Safety
results.description: Became fully compliant with BIS & IEC standards.
